Classes
Value Transformers
BaseTenAppKit

Classes

class  BXObjectStatusToColorTransformer
 
class  BXObjectStatusToEditableTransformer
 

Detailed Description

Transform database objects' status to various information. BXDatabaseObject has statusInfo (BXDatabaseObject) method which returns a proxy for retrieving object's status. The status may then be passed to NSValueTransformer subclasses. For example, an NSTableColumn's editable binding may be bound to a key path like arrayController.arrangedObjects.statusInfo.some_key_name and the value transformer may then be set to BXObjectStatusToEditableTransformer.
